H8050.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Elkanah<SDBH:אֶלְקָנָה>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► judge and {L:prophet<SDBH:נָבִיא>}

H4191.def: = process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

H6908.def: = action by which humans or animals come together as a group for a common purpose

H5594.def: = action by which human perform the mourning ritual for someone who has died, or for another tragic event; this may include {L:wailing<SDBH:ילל>}, tearing one's clothes, putting on {L:sackcloth<SDBH:שַׂק>}, covering oneself with dust or ashes, {L:fasting<SDBH:צום>} or eating specific food, {L:cutting oneself<SDBH:גדד>}, {L:shaving one's head<SDBH:קרח>}, covering part of one's face, etc.; this usually takes place during a specific period of time and ends after the burial has taken place, but it may also be repeated in later days to commemorate a tragic event

H6912.def: = to put the body of someone who died in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, but also with honor and respect

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H7414.def: = an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a {L:mountain<SDBH:הַר>}

H3381.def: = process by which objects move (involuntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

H4057.def: = area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals

H6290.def: = desert; ◄ located south of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, west of {L:Edom<SDBH:אֱדֹום>} and north of {L:Sinai<SDBH:סִינַי>} desert

H4584.def: = a location that deities, humans or animals have made their dwelling place; ≈ associated with security

H3760.def: = newly ripened grain which has just been harvested and which has not yet been dried for storage or for grinding into flour

H505.def: = generic term for domesticated oxen, both male and female; ► kept for milk and used for plowing

H5795.def: = a fairly small, female domestic animal, usually black and with floppy ears, hooves and relatively short hair, and usually found in one single {L:flock<SDBH:צֹאן>} with sheep; ► raised for its milk, meat, and skin; a clean animal and therefore to be eaten

H6629.def: = group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

H2820.def: = causative action by which human or deities keep something to themselves, refusing to give it to someone else

H5650.def: = man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H26.def: = woman, also known as {L:Abigal<SDBH:אֲבִיגַל>}; ► wife of {L:Nabal<SDBH:נָבָל>}, who later married king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H5650.def: = man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

H26.def: = woman, also known as {L:Abigal<SDBH:אֲבִיגַל>}; ► wife of {L:Nabal<SDBH:נָבָל>}, who later married king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H3760.def: = newly ripened grain which has just been harvested and which has not yet been dried for storage or for grinding into flour

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H7812.def: = to lay oneself down on the ground ► as a sign of submission

H639.def: = the two external openings in the nose

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H519.def: = woman who is the legal property of someone else; either married or eligible for marriage; her children belong to the person who owns her; ≈ because of this an  אָמָה  appears to have a somewhat higher status than a  שִׁפְחָה  even though both terms are sometimes used interchangeably

H7364.def: = causative action by which humans or animals wash (part of) their own body or someone else's body or another object, usually with water, ► in order to remove any dirt; ≈ the resulting cleanness often symbolizes ritual cleanness, innocence, or even holiness

H7272.def: = the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and --by extension-- of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H113.def: = man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer

H5650.def: = man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

H26.def: = woman, also known as {L:Abigal<SDBH:אֲבִיגַל>}; ► wife of {L:Nabal<SDBH:נָבָל>}, who later married king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H4116.def: = action by which humans or deities act without delay

H7392.def: = action by which humans ride on a domestic animal such as a {L:donkey<SDBH:חֲמֹור>} or a {L:horse<SDBH:סוּס>} or in a {L:chariot<SDBH:מֶרְכָּבָה>}

H2543.def: = domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see {L:עַיִר<SDBH:עַיִר>}; female see {L:אָתֹון<SDBH:אָתֹון>}

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H2568.def: = state in which a countable entity is five in number

H5291.def: = a young female, ranging from childhood to adulthood; ► often in the service of other people

H7272.def: = the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and --by extension-- of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H4397.def: = a human or supernatural being who carries a message on behalf of someone else

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3157.def: = town; ◄ located in the {L:hill country<SDBH:הַר>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H7586.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Kish<SDBH:קִישׁ>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► first king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H4324.def: = woman; ◄ daughter of king {L:Saul<SDBH:שָׁאוּל>}, younger sister of {L:Merab<SDBH:מֵרַב>}; ► wife of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H6406.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Raphu<SDBH:רָפוּא>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
